title: Zika vaccines should induce responses by CD4+ T cells

title_detail.value: Zika vaccines should induce responses by CD4+ T cells

summary: Immune cells called CD4+ T cells could be important mediators of protection against the Zika virus, according to a new study. The findings support vaccine strategies that induce a protective CD4+ T cell response to the Zika virus.

summary_detail.value: Immune cells called CD4+ T cells could be important mediators of protection against the Zika virus, according to a new study. The findings support vaccine strategies that induce a protective CD4+ T cell response to the Zika virus.
